item.title: POOOOL
item.description:
Title: POOOOL
Genre: Casual , Indie
Developer: Noah King
Publisher: digimoss
Release Date: Jun 8, 2024




About This Game

POOOOL is a small, pool-inspired physics-based puzzler where you combine pool balls of matching size and color to create bigger ones! Combining balls increases your score, but if the table gets too full and you run out of room, it's game over. Use only your mouse to control the angle and power of every shot!



  • âšª Create combos and perform bank shots with satisfying physics interactions!
  • ðŸ”´ Choose the power and angle of each fling!
  • ðŸŸ  Control the entire game with ease and comfort using just your mouse.
  • ðŸŸ¡ Charming and customizable backgrounds and faces.
  • ðŸŸ¢ Compete against yourself to beat your hi-score!
  • ðŸ”µ Share your scores with custom postcard snapshots. Share with friends!
  • ðŸŸ£ Every round is different â€” endlessly replayable!

Windows

    • Memory: 4 GB RAM

    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560

item.title: Tale of Rainbow 7:Prologue
item.description:
Title: Tale of Rainbow 7:Prologue
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG , Free to Play
Developer: å…‰å…‰
Publisher: BD Games
Release Date: Jun 8, 2024




About This Game

The difference between the prologue(demo version) and the official version
Playable characters: 2 in the prologue. The official version adds 5 more characters (gradually introduced as the story progresses), each with their own unique set of 4 skills and 6 selectable traits.
City Maps: 1 in the prologue. The official version adds 2 more maps (introduced as the story progresses). Each city map provides multiple locations and indoor maps for players to explore.
Equipment and Items: The official version includes a greater variety of high-level equipment, items, and cybernetic enhancements.
Abilities (non-character skills): The official version provides more abilities for characters to learn.
Unlockable Battle Strikers: 3 in the prologue. The official version adds 7 more Battle Strikers that can be unlocked during gameplay.
Mini-games: The official version includes a greater variety of gashapon collectibles and more knowledge quizzes (all providing additional rewards)
Enemy Bosses: The official version includes at least 9 unique enemy boss characters, each with their own distinct traits and characteristics.
Tattoo System: The official version introduces a tattoo system that allows players to choose tattoos to enhance character attributes or strengthen combat strategies.
Combat Weather System: The official version introduces a sandstorm weather factor.
Side Quests: The official version offers more side quests.
Random Events: The official version provides more random events on city maps.
Save File: It cannot be guaranteed at the moment that save files from the prologue can be carried over to the official version.







The game is a story-driven RPG that uses turn-based battle system.



You will lead a bounty team on a special adventure in a cyberpunk-like world.



A cyberpunk-like adventure world using pixel style
The battle system that integrates dynamic weather system, skills, striker system, stunts, traits and other content makes the battle full of fun and strategy



Various equipment, items, cybernetics, tattoos, and other elements are used to enhance the various attributes of characters.



In addition to the main storyline, the game also includes various side quests and random events. There are multiple mini-games, gashapon collections, and other elements that allow players to unlock new features or obtain new rewards.
Descrierea conÈ›inutului pentru adulÈ›i indisponibilÄƒ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: windows 7,8,10
    • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core
    • Memory: 2 GHz2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Alice in the Nightmare Land
item.description:
Title: Alice in the Nightmare Land
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG , Simulation
Developer: Tsukki's Tea Party
Publisher: OTAKU Plan
Release Date: Jun 7, 2024




About This Game



Alice awakens in an unfamiliar place. In search of her lost sister, Alice ventures through the eerie mansion.


This is an escape adventure game.
Within a building full of traps and mechanisms, your goal is to find the exit.
Players will play as Alice, navigating through sealed rooms using click-based interactions to find items and solve the mechanisms to advance to the next stage.


  • Escape game
  • Puzzle elements included




Descrierea conÈ›inutului pentru adulÈ›i indisponibilÄƒ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: 10
    • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: 11
    • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: Bodycam
item.description:
Title: Bodycam
Genre: Action , Indie , Massively Multiplayer , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: Reissad Studio
Publisher: Reissad Studio
Release Date: Jun 7, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Jun 7, 2024




About This Game

BODYCAM is an ultra-realistic multiplayer first-person shooter game built using the latest technologies from the next-generation Unreal Engine 5 game engine. Developed by two French video game enthusiasts aged 17 and 20, the game was designed to push the boundaries of realism and photorealism: a truly revolutionary experience for the genre.



With the capabilities and technologies available through Unreal Engine 5, players will experience a next-generation gaming experience that showcases the future of realistic video games - stunning graphics, immersive sound effects, as well as a revolutionary shooting and movement experience.



Prepare to dive into intense combat phases with your teammates, plan strategies to triumph over your opponents using your equipment. Ultra-detailed environments allow for total immersion and in-depth tactics. Enjoy classic game modes like Deathmatch or Team Deathmatch, and also a brand new Body Bomb mode designed for competition. Cooperation and communication with your teammates will be essential to win!



We strongly recommend that you refer to the required specifications to ensure that your computer meets the minimum requirements to take full advantage of BODYCAM's full potential.

BODYCAM will be released in beta state soon and will be regularly updated thanks to feedback from the community on our social networks, with multiple correction and content patches.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Game contains shooting and killing events of other players as it involves gunfights in order to progress in the game.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X, Intel Core i7-9700K
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 (8 GB)
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 50 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3800X, Intel Core i7-10700K
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 (12 GB)
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 50 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

item.title: Street Fighterâ„¢ 6 - Year 2 Ultimate Pass
item.description:
Title: Street Fighterâ„¢ 6 - Year 2 Ultimate Pass
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: CAPCOM Co., Ltd.
Publisher: CAPCOM Co., Ltd.
Franchise: Street Fighter
Release Date: Jun 7, 2024




About This Content

Year 2 Ultimate Pass
- 4 additional characters (M. Bison, Terry, Mai, Elena)
- 4 additional characters' colors: Outfit 1 Colors 3-10
- 4 additional characters' costume: Outfit 2 (including colors 1-10)
- 4 additional characters' costume: Outfit 3 (including colors 1-10)
- 2 additional stages
- Purchase bonus: 7,700 Drive Tickets

Release Schedule
M. Bison Update - Summer 2024
Terry Update - Autumn 2024
Mai Update - Winter 2025
Elena Update - Spring 2025

* Additional content will be released sequentially.
* Please check the official website for product details and release schedule.
